law.catch_line: Application and construction of KRS 403.800 to 403.880.
law.text: In applying and construing KRS 403.800 to 403.880, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 39, effective July 13, 2004.
